name: Skate or Drive
description:
Skate or Drive, or Skate and Drive. Do tricks and stuff. Simple game/toy made for No More Sweden 2017.

  • Arrow keys to steer / trick
  • Space to ollie
  • P to toggle Post-processing

By:

  • Mårten Brüggemann @supermarten
  • Lucas Kampmann Duroj @lucasduroj
  • Jonas Löfgren @bildmekanik
